Featured.info: A somewhat minimalist and creative portfolio website for a creative UI designer and UX researcher who loves minimalist designs
A web app that allow users generate favicons of different sizes, formats and respective HTML code for easy implementation
A simple portfolio website for a frontend developer who loves minimalism and simplicity, with a touch of creativity

Notable.title: FrontEnd Only Interactive Comment App
Notable.info: A single-page comment section app using React.JS, react hooks and Context API and TailwindCSS. The design was from a FrontEndMentor challenge.

Notable.title: FrontEnd Only Interactive Credit Card Generator
Notable.info: A single-page credit card generator app using React.JS, useReducer Hook and Context API for state management. The design was from a FrontEndMentor challenge.

Notable.title: E-commerce Product Page and Cart
Notable.info: A responsive e-commerce product page and a functional cart built with HTML5, TailwindCSS and JavaScript and an OOP approach.

Notable.title: Interactive Todo App
Notable.info: A single-page todo app built with HTML5, TailwindCSS, JavaScript and the OOP approach in mind. Implemented a dark mode and drag and drop functionality.

Notable.title: Cocktail DATABASE
Notable.info: A web app to help search for the preparation methods of your favourite cocktails. Built with React.JS, CSS3 and thecocktaildb API
